title: New: The Shins – Simple Song
content:
Here it is, four years in the making; the first slither of new material from The Shins in the form of the ludicrously anthemic Simple Song.

Without meaning to sound cliched, it is relatively straightforward for a comeback single, channeling Mercer’s folk-pop influences into a four minute treat. With their fourth album Port Of Morrow out in March, here’s hoping for a full UK tour in support of the record.
